description.value: You can call upon the creatures of the wild for aid. You gain an additional spell slot of your highest level, which you can use only to cast @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Summon Animal] or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Summon Plant or Fungus]. You can cast either of these spells using that spell slot, even if it they aren't in your spell repertoire.
